name: Bibliography Implementation
description: Validates that the essay includes a Works Cited section, Image Credits, and inline citations sync with the bibliography. Audit report must not indicate failure.

validations.description: At least one bibliography audit artifact must exist
Bibliography audit must not have FAIL status in frontmatter
Bibliography audit must not report overall failure

notes: G5.5 validates that the Bibliography Orchestrator has produced and audited the Works Cited, Image Credits, A/V Credits, and Data Sources sections. The audit report confirms inline↔bibliography synchronization. The not_contains checks verify the audit didn't conclude with a failure status. See BIBLIOGRAPHY_STRUCTURE_GUIDE.md and ARTIFACT_CITATION_PATTERNS_GUIDE.md for patterns.
